title: About
heading: Designing products people
bioParagraphs:
I'm Lee Gordon — a product designer with over 15 years of experience building digital products, leading design teams, and helping organizations understand the impact of thoughtful, research-driven design. My career has taken me from agency life at R/GA and DigitasLBi, through in-house roles at Nokia and Covetrus, to leading design at Fold where I built and scaled a design team that transformed their Bitcoin rewards product. I've worked across fintech, IoT, airlines, veterinary tech, and e-commerce — always bringing the same core philosophy: understand people deeply, then design with intention.

Today, I'm bringing that experience to more clients while exploring AI and agentic interfaces. I believe the best designers understand their medium, keep up with rapid change, and build the things they design.

timeline.role: Product Design and AI Interface Design
timeline.description: Reimagining what interface and product design are in the age of agents and vibe coding.
Led design team of 2, built design system, led redesign, and drove 3x improvement in onboarding completion for Bitcoin rewards app.
Humanized complex Lightning Network protocols through intuitive product design and brand evolution.
Directed UX for Nokia Smart Home IoT platform, achieving 94% setup completion rate.
Led digital experience design for enterprise clients including Qantas Airlines.
Crafted connected product experiences and digital campaigns for global brands.
Built digital experiences and brand identities for emerging and established brands.
Started career at one of the world's most innovative agencies, learning the craft of digital product design with clients like Nike and Verizon.
